alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 1:34PM MST until December 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible above 8000 feet with 8 to 14 inches possible above 8500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 8000 feet near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially on Buffalo Pass in the Chuska Mountains. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 8 PM Friday to 5 PM Saturday: Alpine 3 to 5 inches Buffalo Pass 4 to 12 inches Ganado 0 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches Show Low 0 inches Whiteriver 0 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains
